column5: Finally got out in my new boat for some brook trout action. Great to get back on the water, especially in my new boat which worked well. The 60 hp pushed it along fine and trolled economically in the current. The custom decal was made from one of my own photos of a brook trout. The first fish measured 20.5"x14.5" and weighted almost 6 lbs. A great start to the season.
Man those river fish are like footballs!  Good job!
Awesome day on the water. A sweet new ride as well.
Beautiful scenery, Beautiful fish and Beautiful boat

Nice day, great fish. Love the markings on that last fish.Unique The new boat is really nice !!! Looks like mine, same color and all, except mine is a Princecraft.  Thankss for the report and pics.  Paul
Humpback trout!!
beautiful fish !!!
Speck-takular !
VERY nice Al... just something right about that colour boat hunting that species!!
Awesome....more!!!!
Beauty, the fish and the boat.  Like the decal too
Ya know i gotta say, ive never liked red in any car or truck ive ever looked at...........but im lovin the color scheme on that boat
Wow, great pictures...AWESOME BROOKIES.  Thanks for sharing.
Nice ride...nice fish...really liking Picture No.2  :thumbsup_anim:
no finer place in the world. thanks for the pics al.

What Wayne said...  The same boat was parked beside me on the highway a few weeks back.  We were going in opposite directions but had the windows down and shared a laugh.  I was pulling my Rebel, him his.  Both with the windows down we just looked at each other and he said "like the boat man" at the same time I said, "sweet ride dood."  Great fish and decal Al, and welcome to the club.
That boat is going to make a great picture parked next to my black Lund when we finally hook up Al.
Wow nice brookie! I love the colour scheme on that boat too!
I bought this same boat but black and have the 2nd console upgrade on the passenger side... we just put it in the water today!!
Just awesome Al. Love the second pic of you with the fish. And the decal? Wish I would have thought of that. Too cool.
